name: No Passport
description:
NO PASSPORT

You're the guard of an airport, a suspicious guy steals one's passport and it's your job to take him before he gets on board but be careful, you only have some characteristics and need to spot him in the middle of the crowd

Can you find who is not the real passenger?

CONTROLS

WASD - Move the character

LMB - Use the tazer gun

ENTER - Pause the game

ESC - Close the game

ALT - unlock the mouse

CREDITS

Characters, cutscene and music - @GoruposStudios

Programming, background and SFX - @edusilvart

thanks to everyone who helped testing the game!
